name: AuditApp_Memberships_ChangesForObject
query:
SELECT
	  datetime(M.DateTime, 'localtime') AS 'Operation DT'
    , st.SystemName
    , Op.Name 'Operation'
    , AT.Name 'Process'
    , U.Name 'Actor'
    , GrpObj.KeyValue 'MembershipKey',
      GrpObj.DisplayName 'MembershipDisplayName'
FROM
	Memberships M
    INNER JOIN Operations Op ON Op.ID = M.OperationID
    INNER JOIN Activities AC ON AC.ID = M.ActivityID
    INNER JOIN ActivityTypes AT ON AT.ID = AC.ActivityTypeID
    INNER JOIN Objects GrpObj ON GrpObj.ID = M.GroupID
    INNER JOIN SystemTables st ON st.ID = GrpObj.SystemTableID
    INNER JOIN Objects MemObj ON MemObj.ID = M.MemberID
    LEFT JOIN Users AS U ON U.ID = AC.UserID
WHERE MemObj.ID = $Key1
ORDER BY datetime(M.DateTime, 'localtime') DESC
